answers.answer: Hello,  this is a question for a specialist eye doctor.Can you go to the eye forums to ask this question.As with all conditions when a person is diabetic if is important for your husband to control his blood sugar as well as possible and keep it as close to normal as possible.Truely normal blood sugars show fasting < 95 and 2 hours after eating of < 120 (though ideally < 100).  For persons with diabetes these numbers may not be easy to achieve, but they are the optimal target (trying always to keep blood sugars < 140).
